value: File:The parish church of St Levan - geograph.org.uk - 1331309.jpg

For those without a car this involves a walk from Porthcurnow
There are fine walks all around the area, with excellent coastal views.

The church is one of the most striking and interesting in an area of striking and interesting churches. Two features of the churchyard are the unusual shaped coffin rest at the northern gate and St Levan's stone.

A prophecy from Merlyn says "When with panniers astride, a pack horse shall ride, through St Levan's stone, the world will be done".

value: "When with panniers astride, a Pack Horse can ride, through St Levan's stone, the world will be done."
